channel.title: Looking For The Prada PR 58LV | Prada VPR58L?
channel.description: Mario and Martino Prada were two brothers and businessmen from Milan. They started a leather goods shop together in 1913, selling mostly handbags and large trunks imported from Britain. Mario, who eventually became the leader of the business, did not believe women had any place in the workplace, so would not allow any of his [...]
